events.message: I ordered a phone case two weeks ago, and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated at all and I'm really concerned about the delay.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on the customer's report of a late shipment and stagnant tracking status.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle the customer's case concerning the delayed delivery.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your order delay. I'm here to help you with this issue and get it resolved as soon as possible.
Could you please provide me with your order number and any tracking details you currently have? This will help me investigate the shipment status.
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and the tracking number listed is ZX987654321. As I mentioned, the tracking hasn't updated in over a week.
I've checked the system and it appears your package is delayed due to a shipping carrier issue. We can either issue a reshipment or offer a full refund if you prefer.
I really wanted the product since it was a gift, so I'd prefer a reshipment rather than a refund, please. But I am frustrated it got delayed this long.
Thank you for letting me know. I've initiated a priority reshipment for your order at no extra charge. You will receive updated tracking information shortly.
The reshipment has been confirmed, and your case is now resolved. Please expect the new package within 5-7 business days.
We wanted to check in and confirm that your reshipped order has arrived and that you are satisfied with the solution provided.
Yes, the package arrived yesterday, and everything is perfect. Thanks for the prompt reshipment and your help throughout!
The case has been closed following customer confirmation of successful delivery and satisfaction with the resolution.
